{"id": 173, "body": {"name": "Near Contract Standards payment request by Robert", "summary": "Contract Standards Work Group grant", "category": "DevDAO Operations", "timeline": {"status": "PAYMENT_PROCESSING", "kyc_verified": true, "test_transaction_sent": true, "sponsor_requested_review": true, "request_for_trustees_created": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": true}, "supervisor": "frol.near", "description": "As a Near Contract Standards WG member, I provide support and review for developing new standards and smart contracts architecture designs:\\\\n* Reviewing new NEPs\\\\n* Enabling and encouraging new contributors to improve the NEAR ecosystem\\\\n* We have meetings to discuss ongoing community proposals, internal proposals and vote & review NEP Pull Requests.\\\\n\\\\nTime: March 2023 - June 2024 (16 months), NOTE: I learned I can\\\\\\'t retroactively bill past year.\\\\nTime billed January 2024 - June 2024 (6 months).\\\\nTime spent: 26h\\\\nTotal Amount: 26\\\\\\\\*120 = 3120  USD\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nRelated PRs\\\\n* https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/533\\\\n* https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/543\\\\n* https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/537\\\\n* https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/528\\\\n\\\\nPast PRs:\\\\n* https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/504\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "robert.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "3120", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "NEAR"}, "labels": []}

(() => {});\\\\n\\\\nconst allOption = [{ label: \\\\\\\"All\\\\\\\", value: \\\\\\\"\\\\\\\" }];\\\\nconst options = categoryOptions.map((i) => {\\\\n return { ...i, label: i.title };\\\\n});\\\\n\\\\nreturn (\\\\n {\\\\n setSelected(v);\\\\n },\\\\n }}\\\\n />\\\\n);\\\\n"}, "devhub.entity.proposal.MultiSelectLabelsDropdown": {"": "const { href } = VM.require(`devhub.near/widget/core.lib.url`);\\\\nhref || (href = () => {});\\\\n\\\\nconst {\\\\n selected,\\\\n onChange,\\\\n disabled,\\\\n availableOptions,\\\\n hideDropdown,\\\\n linkedRfp,\\\\n} = props;\\\\n\\\\nconst [selectedOptions, setSelectedOptions] = useState([]);\\\\nconst [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);\\\\nconst [initialStateApplied, setInitialState] = useState(false);\\\\n\\\\nconst toggleDropdown = () => {\\\\n setIsOpen(!isOpen);\\\\n};\\\\n\\\\nuseEffect(() => {\\\\n if (JSON.stringify(selectedOptions) !== JSON.stringify(selected)) {\\\\n if (availableOptions.length > 0) {\\\\n if ((selected ?? []).some((i) => !i.value)) {\\\\n setSelectedOptions(\\\\n selected.map((i) => availableOptions.find((t) => t.value === i))\\\\n );\\\\n } else {\\\\n setSelectedOptions(selected);\\\\n }\\\\n setInitialState(true);\\\\n }\\\\n } else {\\\\n setInitialState(true);\\\\n }\\\\n}, [selected, availableOptions]);\\\\n\\\\nuseEffect(() => {\\\\n if (\\\\n JSON.stringify(selectedOptions) !== JSON.stringify(selected) &&\\\\n initialStateApplied\\\\n ) {\\\\n onChange(selectedOptions);\\\\n }\\\\n}, [selectedOptions, initialStateApplied]);\\\\n\\\\nconst Container = styled.div`\\\\n .drop-btn {\\\\n width: 100%;\\\\n text-align: left;\\\\n padding-inline: 10px;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .dropdown-toggle:after {\\\\n position: absolute;\\\\n top: 46%;\\\\n right: 2%;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .dropdown-menu {\\\\n width: 100%;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .dropdown-item.active,\\\\n .dropdown-item:active {\\\\n background-color: #f0f0f0 !important;\\\\n color: black;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .disabled {\\\\n background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;\\\\n cursor: not-allowed !important;\\\\n border-radius: 5px;\\\\n opacity: inherit !important;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .disabled.dropdown-toggle::after {\\\\n display: none !important;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .custom-select {\\\\n position: relative;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .selected {\\\\n background-color: #f0f0f0;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .cursor-pointer {\\\\n cursor: pointer;\\\\n }\\\\n\\\\n .text-wrap {\\\\n overflow: hidden;\\\\n white-space: normal;\\\\n }\\\\n`;\\\\n\\\\nconst handleOptionClick = (option) => {\\\\n if (!selectedOptions.some((item) => item.value === option.value)) {\\\\n setSelectedOptions([...selectedOptions, option]);\\\\n }\\\\n setIsOpen(false);\\\\n};\\\\n\\\\nconst Item = ({ option }) => {\\\\n return
{option.title}
;\\\\n};\\\\n\\\\nreturn (\\\\n <>\\\\n

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Megha for 07/15/2024 - 08/11/2024", "summary": "Worked on treasury dashboard: added new payment and members page, added base for stake delegation requests.\\\\nWorked on devhub and other instances: fixed minor bugs, created reusable proposal feed component.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "### Summary of Activities\\\\n##### Week 1 (15 July to 21 July)\\\\n\\\\n- Call with Ori about treasury dashboard (1h)\\\\n- Add create new stake delegate request page [#34](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/34) (1.5d)\\\\n- Call with Ori about treasury self creation (0.5h)\\\\n- Create the flow of the treasury self-creation and share with Ori (0.5h)\\\\n- Team call (1h)\\\\n- Fix filter issue for terms and condition [#880](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/880) (0.5h)\\\\n- Update the devhub kanban board, clear backlog (0.5h)\\\\n- Create new doc of flow as per team call and share with Ori (1h)\\\\n- Fix the empty log issue, fix `edit_proposal` timeline when it move past decision stage, fix infra RFP tests [#881](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/881) (4h)\\\\n- Review PR (1.5h)\\\\n- Discuss with Vadim about github CI actions, merge release for instances, create common build cmd, discuss with Peter about the issues with instances deployment, deploy [treasury](https://near.social/treasury-devdao.near/widget/app?page=operations) components [#890](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/890) [#892](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/892) (1d) \\\\n- Create unstaking (w/ and w/o error) pages  [#34](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/34) (1.5d)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 42.5 hours\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 2 (22 July to 28 July)\\\\n\\\\n- Call with Ori and Vova (1.5h)\\\\n- Discuss with Peter about better ways to fetch data about staking pools since nearblocks API lacks some (0.5h)\\\\n- Update code to use nearblocks and RPC to get staking pools data (4h)\\\\n- Checkout issue mentioned by Trentin about labels issue with linked RFP and fix it [#901](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/901) (0.5h)\\\\n- Call with Thomas about how to manage instances reusable code, deploy events updated indexer and contract (2h)\\\\n- Team call (0.5h)\\\\n- Call with Peter and fix the release issue (1.5h)\\\\n- Refactor events-committee [#905](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/905) (4h)\\\\n- Review PRs (1h)\\\\n- Call with Ori, go through the design, text Ori and Vlad about doubts (1h)\\\\n- Refactor proposal feed to use one component in all three instances, add \\\\u{201c}Load more\\\\u{201d} and fix the filtering issue in other instances, update tests, discuss with Peter on how to update playwright config to run all three instances, work on Elliot\\\\u{2019}s suggestions [#912](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/912) (2d)\\\\n- Checkout the issue with indexer of devhub and infra (0.5h)\\\\n- Fix the .then error flashes on infra and failing tests [#909](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/909) (2h)\\\\n- Check the issue with failing devhub deployment and upgrade the bos-cli version [#910](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/910) (1h)\\\\n- Add the new navbar and tab option, drawer flow to create payment request [#30](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/30) (1d) \\\\n\\\\nTotal: 44 hours\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 3 (29 July to 4 August)\\\\n\\\\n- Discuss with Peter and Vlad about bos-cli error (0.5h)\\\\n- Add .tg to near account checks [#911](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/911) (0.5h)\\\\n- Call with Ori regarding self creation flow (2h)\\\\n- Add new form with proposal and manual request [#30](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/30) (1d)\\\\n- Review PRs (0.5h)\\\\n- Team call (2h)\\\\n- Add new table for pending requests and history with new columns, add fn to fetch paginated status filtered results from contract, add fn to get threshold and approvers from multiple groups with certain permissions [#30](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/30) (3.5d) \\\\n\\\\nTotal: 41.5 hours\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 4 (5 August to 11 August)\\\\n\\\\n- Fix canvas UI for near social [#35](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/35) [#37](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/37) (2h)\\\\n- Move to public storage for refresh and settings dropdown [#36](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/36) (2h)\\\\n- Chat with Peter about calculation of required votes and fix it [#38](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/38) (1.5h)\\\\n- Add members page UI with different groups/permissions, support filter and pagination, delete modal confirmation, make it mobile responsive, configure needed groups with the testing sputnik dao, update threshold to meet needed votes requirement [#41](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/41) (3d)\\\\n- Call with Ori and Vova about payment requests enhancements and self creation flow (2h)\\\\n- Work on enhancements as discussed with Ori, figure out why UI looks different on org gateway, add separate css for different gateway, discuss with Thomas about the same UI issues on devhub  [#39](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/39) (1d)\\\\n- Check the issue mentioned by Trentin, update the viewer to use same markdown as simpleMDE, update test for about page, discuss with Peter about the iframe and parent scrollbar [#921](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/921) (2h)\\\\n\\\\nTotal: 41.5 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal Hours: 169.5\\\\nHourly rate: $50/h\\\\nTotal: 8475 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "megha19.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8475", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "OTHER"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 125615071}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *DevDAO Platform* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @megha19.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}DevHub Developer Contributor report by Megha for 07/15/2024 - 08/11/2024\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nWorked on treasury dashboard: added new payment and members page, added base for stake delegation requests.\\\\\\\\nWorked on devhub and other instances: fixed minor bugs, created reusable proposal feed component.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=174)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

These activities aim to improve the developer experience in the NEAR ecosystem. \\\\n", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "editor_id": "pivortex.near", "timestamp": "1723481859420529896", "supervisor": "gagdiez.near", "description": "\\\\n## Timeline\\\\nStart Date: July 15, 2024\\\\n\\\\nEnd Date: July 28, 2024\\\\n\\\\u{200b}\\\\n## Requested Funding\\\\nHours: 47:10 \\\\n\\\\nRate: $50/hour \\\\n\\\\nTotal Amount: $2358\\\\n\\\\n# Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n### Developer and community support \\\\n- 5:00 Supporting and interacting with developers through Discord, Telegram and office hours.\\\\n- 1:00 Chain Abstraction community call planning \\\\n\\\\n## Contributions\\\\n- 23:50 Working on Auction tutorial series [repo](https://github.com/near-examples/auctions-tutorial), [docs](https://github.com/near/docs/pull/2183)\\\\n- 0:20 Fix broken bounty link \\\\n- 1:00 Restructure near-mulichain [repo](https://github.com/near-examples/near-multichain/tree/develop)\\\\n\\\\n## Content \\\\n- 11:00 Aggregating, writing and pushing out the dev Newsletter\\\\n- 1:05 Cohost DevHub live\\\\n\\\\n### General / Other \\\\n- 2:05 DevRel team calls\\\\n- 1:50 One-on-one with Guillermo\\\\n- 1:00 Misc activities, little odd jobs.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "icespice.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "2358", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "pivortex.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "Owen DevRel Contributor Report 27 July - 11 August", "summary": "Bi-weekly paid developer relations contributor report.
